advancement.description: The namespace and ID of the advancement to be revoked from the player.
advancement.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the advancement to be revoked from the player.

criteria.description: If specified, determines the criteria to revoke from the specified advancement.
criteria.markdownDescription: If specified, determines the criteria to revoke from the specified advancement.

criterion.description: If specified, determines the criterion to revoke from the specified advancement.
criterion.markdownDescription: If specified, determines the criterion to revoke from the specified advancement.

selection.description: Determines how to select the parent advancement(s) or child(ren) advancement(s) of the specified advancement. Can be one of: `"only"`, `"through"`, `"from"`, `"until"`, `"everything"`
selection.markdownDescription: Determines how to select the parent advancement(s) or child(ren) advancement(s) of the specified advancement. Can be one of: `"only"`, `"through"`, `"from"`, `"until"`, `"everything"`

type.description:
## Revoke Advancement

---



[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/revoke_advancement)

Revokes an advancement from the player.

Type ID: `origins:revoke_advancement`




---

### Examples

```json
"entity_action": {
    "type": "origins:revoke_advancement",
    "advancement": "minecraft:adventure/arbalistic"
}
```

This example will revoke the Arbalistic advancement from the player, if they have it.
